settings.ocrServiceDesc: See the documentation for more details:
settings.commandDesc: Shell command to execute (desktop-only, Tesseract will be used instead on mobile), using {input} and {output} for the file paths
settings.testTooltip: Test command with a sample image
settings.convertPdfsDesc: Convert PDF pages to PNG images before processing
settings.useEmbeddedTextDesc: When a PDF already contains embedded text, use it instead of extracting with OCR

modals.extractedWarning_one: Text extracted from {{count}} attachment. The following were skipped:
modals.extractedWarning_other: Text extracted from {{count}} attachments. The following were skipped:
modals.extractAllWarning: Make sure you have a backup of your vault before extracting text from attachments in all notes.

notices.mobileServiceFallback: Custom commands are not available on mobile, using Tesseract
notices.mobileServiceFallbackSetting: Custom commands are not available on mobile, Tesseract will be used instead
notices.testNoOutput: Command succeeded but no output file produced
notices.testOutputMismatch: Command succeeded but output ("{{actual}}") does not match expected ("{{expected}}").

errors.commandFailed: Custom command failed with exit code {{code}} (see console for details)
